title: Joie De Vivre At Buitenplaats De Horte
text:
On Dag van het Kasteel on Monday 5 June more than 100 Dutch castles open their doors. At Buitenplaats de Horte, By MÃ¶lle and Landschap Overijssel organise a special program for you. Buitenplaats de Horte is one of the most beautiful spots in Overijssel. You can still feel the rich history of the estate and its owners. A hidden treasure where you find silence, space and time to enjoy slow living.

Program: Monday 5 June

Enjoy slow Italian coffee and local produce in the historical gardens. Go for a stroll with your kids on the experience trail, and discover the monumental buildings, forest and farm land. We hope to see you there!

  • guided tours about the history and nature
  • 5 km walk with stories about Buitenplaats de Horte
  • kids experience trail with lots of fun facts (2,5 km)

Address: Buitenplaats de Horte, Poppenallee 39, 7722 KW, Dalfsen
Time: Monday 5 June, from 12 am until 5 pm

title: A dream to sleep in
